attributes.action: I want to see my daughter "she is five months old"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was in uk since 1996 and been adviced with so many wrong ways to stay in uk, finally got engaged in nottingham in 2005 and left uk for pakistan, got married /December2005 applied spouse visa with the wrong advice from my solicitor in London, he did not mention to my spouse visa application that deportation still enforced on me,i got spouse visa in May/2006 came back to uk, but because of deportation still enforced i have to go back to pakistan, and apply again in 2006/24/November. during this this time i been blessed with a loving daughter, but my spouse visa its still in process in Islamabad BHC,since last 7months i cant see my five months old daughter, my mother in law fell in breast cancer since past six months, and my wife i apart from each other please help me i beg to every one, please i want to see my daughter.my wife is a professional person working in QMC hospital in nottingham, she is having a worst and difficult time without me,its been year since i came back i am dying to see my family. please help this helpless father. during my stay in uk i never claimed a single penny from govt: and also working with ambulance helping old people to the hospital in sheffield.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
